sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SMELL, odour, with regard to the organ, is an impreſſion made on the noſe by little particles continually exhaling from odorous bodies : With regard to the object, it is the figure and diſpoſition of odorous effluvia, which, sticking on the organ, excite the ſenſe of smelling : And with regard to the soul; it is the perception of the impreſſion of the object on the organ, or the affection in the foul reſulting therefrom. See Anatomy, n⁰ 140 ; and Metaphysics.
